name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Raven Shield
name_original: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Raven Shield
description:
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Raven Shield is an action-shooter game developed by Ubisoft Montreal, Red Storm and Ubisoft Milan. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Raven Shield on Xbox, GameCube, PlayStation 2 and PC.
It was scored by Bill Brown.
